subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which king established the city of Jaipur?
question_hi: जयपुर के लैंग्डर किस ने बनाया था?
explanation_en: Sawai Jai Singh II is the king who established the city of Jaipur.
explanation_hi: सवाई जयंसिंगी एल ने जयपुत्रों ने जापान को सीलाई की भूमि को बनाया है।
question_en: Who is the founder of Jaipur?
question_hi: जापान को सीलाई की भूमि के लिया हों
explanation_en: Sawai Jai Singh II is the king who founded the city of Jaipur.
explanation_hi: सवाई जयंसिंगी एल का संतुलाई की भूमि को सीलाई के लिया हों

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Who is the famous king of Rajasthan?
question_hi: राजस्थान के लोकपुराण के परंपूर्व सद्यां
explanation_en: Chan Singh II is a famous king of Rajasthan, who was the founder of Udaipur.
explanation_hi: चांन सिंगी एल राजस्थान मूल सद्यां के लोकपुराण के परंपूर्व सद्यां

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: What is the capital city of Rajasthan?
explanation_en: Jaipur is the capital city of Rajasthan.

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: When was the Battle of Haldighati fought?
explanation_en: The Battle of Haldighati was fought between Maharaja Pratap Singh and Akbar in 1562.
explanation_hi: हल्दिघटी महाराज़्यां के बादियां के बजानां की बैलेबादियां

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Who was the builder of Amer Fort?
explanation_en: Amer Fort was built by Raja Man Singh I.

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Who was the founder of Jaipur?
explanation_en: Pratap Singh was the founder of Jaipur.

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which Rajput clan was the ruling family of Jaipur?
explanation_en: The ruling family of Jaipur were the Kshatriya Rajput clan.

subject: Rajasthan History
explanation_en: Jhala Fort was established by Sawai Singh II.

subject: Rajasthan History
explanation_en: Maharana Pratap Singh II was the king who ruled Jaipur.

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Who ruled Rajasthan during the Mughal Era?
explanation_en: Amar Singh I ruled Rajasthan during the Mughal Era.

subject: Rajasthan History
explanation_en: Pratap Singh II is the king who established Mehrangar Fort.

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which festival is celebrated in Jaipur?
explanation_en: Jaisera is a famous festival of Jaipur.

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Who was the emperor of Rajasthan?
explanation_en: Yashwari was the emperor of Rajasthan.
